description.displayText: We hired Lindsay to babysit our 4 children over 2 nights when we were visiting New York.  She was very punctual, reliable, and the kids took to her immediately.  She was in charge of reading to them and putting them to bed which she seemed to handle it with ease.  We would definitely hire her again and I'm sure the kids would be thrilled to have her!
description.originalText: We hired Lindsay to babysit our 4 children over 2 nights when we were visiting New York.  She was very punctual, reliable, and the kids took to her immediately.  She was in charge of reading to them and putting them to bed which she seemed to handle it with ease.  We would definitely hire her again and I'm sure the kids would be thrilled to have her!

description.displayText: Lindsay watched my 18 month old son during the summer of 2016 (would still be using her if we hadn't moved away!).  She was a complete natural with him, they had so much fun together!  She took him to the park, played and read books at home, prepared meals for him, and generally helped us keep him on a schedule.   She was also great with our family dog and helped with tidying up the apartment.  She's great with kids, very personable and extremely trustworthy.  I would not hesitate to recommend her to anyone!
